name: Expedition Before Sundown
description:
The tale of the Sundown village is a tale that many have known. A once prosperous village turned to poverty to their own greed. As the cursed forests surrounding the village grew restless, their food went sparse. As the last Hunter of your village, you are in charge of collecting food for the whole village.

Combat your way through waves and waves of enemies in this Survival Action Roguelike game. Fight for the lives in the village, and maybe you might even be able to free them from their eternal curse.

Made for a School Project.
